---

# serializeHookConfig

Serializes a `HookConfig` object into a 26-byte hex string.

## Import

```ts
import { serializeHookConfig } from "@account-kit/smart-contracts";
```

## Usage

```ts
const config = serializeHookConfig({
  moduleAddress: "0xAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAA",
  entityId: 1234,
  hookType: HookType.EXECUTION,
  hasPreHooks: true,
  hasPostHooks: false,
});
```

## Parameters

### config

`HookConfig`
The hook configuration to serialize

## Returns

`Hex`
A 26-byte hex string representation of the hook configuration
